text: The 1st version of the Pan American Games was held in 1951 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Over 2,500 athletes from 21 countries competed in 20 sports.Juegos Panamericanos Buenos Aires 1951 - ESPNdeportes.com; Retrieved in 2015-07-13 ==References== Category:Pan American Games Category:1951 in sports
title: 1951 Pan American Games
